about_the_game:
Welcome to Flavor City, would-be Crew Member! You've been handpicked by Nummy! Brands to attend the prestigious Business' School for Quick Service Restaurant Professionals, where you'll learn everything you need to dominate in the lucrative fast food industry. Of course, the food's not the only thing that's hot'n'ready in this kitchen - you're about to share a prep station with four of the hunkiest mascots in town! Did we mention they're single...?



Do you have what it takes to make it in the fast paced world of quick service? Attend classes, choose your subjects and grill up some ruckus with some of the most marketable boys in the business! Or dedicate yourself to quality service at an affordable price and go solo.

After class, explore the fast food capital of the world: Flavor City! Pick your destination and tour coffee shops, restaurants, nightclubs, sewers, beaches or the park! Mascots are busy people with schedules of their own, so choose wisely if you're cookin' to catch one of these boys out and about.

Discover the personalities beneath the public personas; make dozens of choices to net craveability points with your favorite mascot and flame broil your way into their heart!



Mackie
Wholesome. Family friendly. Transdimensional. He may be pushing three hundred, but he doesn't look a day over 250. Can you help him find the 'happy' in Happy Meal again?

Kai
Passionate. Creative. Contractually mysterious. School's only other human student - but where'd the canine ears and tail come from? And more importantly - can you teach this dog to hunt again?

Sovereign
Bold. Brash. Borderline felon. The resident hard-rockin' bad-boy of Flavor City; he prefers to let his flame-grilled beef do the talking. Can you break through his tough exterior to the soft serve inside?

The General
Calm. Collected. Undiagnosed workaholic. The silver-fox leader of mascots everywhere with all the world on his shoulders. Can you teach the teacher some of what he's forgotten about life outside his culinary kingdom?



Romance the Mascot of Your Dreams
In classic dating sim/choose your own adventure fashion, compete for the affection of four distinct mascots inspired by real world brand representatives, with expansive routes for each completely unique to them.

Zany Misadventures Galore
Jam out with a mascot rock band, slice through supersized roaches, punch out sapient sandwiches a thousand feet in the air, bomb delivery cars with makeshift hot sauce Molotov cocktails! There's no end to (mis)adventures in Flavor City.

Lots and Lots of Choices
Line cook, or cash register? After-class study sesh, or volleyball at the beach? What's the future of Tex-Mex: triple decker tacos, or taco-flavored soda? Make dozens of choices and experience wildly different adventures each time you play!

Supersize My He(Art)
Beautiful art inspired by a combo of Western cartoon and Eastern anime, with a fully functional gallery to revisit the 50+ CGs, a Music page to listen to our 37 songs and an in-game Character Encyclopedia!

A Truly Unique World
Step into a fully realized setting with dozens of characters with their own backstories, motivations, and plenty of lore to uncover along the way. Whether it's the food, the mascots or anything else - nothing in Flavor City is exactly what it seems.

content_descriptors.notes: Includes mild suggestive themes, some blood and violence, menacing language, and references to off-screen violent acts.

Minimum:

  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to Flavor City, Crew Member! Slip into some non-slips, cozy up to one of four deliciously dateable mascots and flame broil your way into their heart in the premier fast food mascot dating sim! Because in this crazy town, the most craveable item on the menu...is love.
